textRoadMap.title: OUR STORY
textRoadMap.text_1: Andrey Yusupov initiated the creation and headed a consumer cooperative with neighbors to jointly purchase products from farmers. The roles were distributed among the members of the cooperative: One takes the groceries today, another tomorrow
textRoadMap.text_2: Our successful experience quickly spread throughout the city, and many people asked for help in starting their own cooperatives. To simplify ordering, accounting, and document management, we organized the development of our first IT platform. Such cooperatives began to organize themselves in offices and factories where neighbors worked.
textRoadMap.text_3: The first office of our cooperative was opened. We are starting to actively invest in the development of IT: solutions for automating cross-docking, first- and last-mile delivery solutions appear, we've developed ordering terminals for offices and factories.
textRoadMap.text_4: In order to expand to other regions and countries, the commercial organization 'EdaEco.club'  was created. Branding, packaging, and many other marketing solutions have been developed, tested, and launched. We started home delivery. The first Eco-Points were opened - solutions for pickup orders in cafes.
textRoadMap.text_5: Andrey Yusupov created 'United Cooperatives' - the beginning of the UNCO story. Our first farm-to-table business in Germany was launched in Berlin: https://unco.club
textRoadMap.text_6: We have launched our new business solution: 'UNCO Farmer's Corner'. A new version of our IT solution was released.
textRoadMap.text_7: Our first 'white label' launched in Germany.
textRoadMap.text_8: Launched in Italy 'white label', the development of a conceptually new eco-friendly and worldwide available business solution and IT solution has begun.
textRoadMap.text_9: We launched the 'white label' in Serbia. The platform https://unco.market - the first solution within the concept 'UNCO Global' goes online.
textRoadMap.text_10: First paying customer in the "UNCO Food Futures for Food Retail" product. The launch of the Freemium "UNCO eco-system" has begun:  https://foodfutures.net  https://foodfutures.club  https://unco.market  https://foodnft.org  https://unco.bio  https://unco.trade
